description: Chai tea is made of black tea mixed with various spices, so it's no surprise that it tastes great when combined with vodka, honey, and maple syrup.
name: Chai Tea Cocktail

recipeInstructions.name: Bring water to a boil and pour 8-ounce into a glass mixing container or right into a serving mug.
